section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this act, the term:

para.text: "DOES" means the Department of Employment Services.
"DSLBD" means the Department of Small and Local Business Development.
"Fund" means the Incarceration to Incorporation Entrepreneurship Fund established by section 4.
"IIEP" means the Incarceration to Incorporation Entrepreneurship Program established by section 3.
